I've taken the trouble to actually release Hamcrest 1.2, now with  
mismatch reporting.

For now, to get the full reporting you have to make sure that you use  
the Hamcrest features from the Hamcrest jar, rather than the ones  
included with JUnit (so use the no-dependencies version). In  
particular, make sure you use the right assertThat() to get the full  
benefit. We hope we can get this fixed soon.

S.
